thread.title: Wagner's portrayal of events 'don't add up': Authorities

title: Wagner's portrayal of events 'don't add up': Authorities
text:
Wagner's portrayal of events 'don't add up': Authorities Tuesday, February 06, 2018 - 02:03 
Lt. John Corina of the Los Angeles Sheriff's Dept. said actor Robert Wagner's version of events portrayed to the media in the unexplained 1981 drowning of his wife, actress Natalie Wood, ''don't add up'' to what authorities have found. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
